code: import{RequestTool}from'../Tools/RequestTool';var GetAll=function GetAll(){return RequestTool.GetRequest(RequestTool.API_URL+"/Market/GetAll");};var Add=function Add(_item){return RequestTool.PostRequest(RequestTool.API_URL+"/Market/Add",_item);};var GetById=function GetById(_item){return RequestTool.GetRequest(RequestTool.API_URL+"/Market/Get/"+_item);};var AddMarketItem=function AddMarketItem(_item){return RequestTool.PostRequest(RequestTool.API_URL+"/MarketItem/Add",_item);};var GetAllItem=function GetAllItem(_id){return RequestTool.GetRequest(RequestTool.API_URL+"/MarketItem/GetAll/"+_id);};var UpdateItem=function UpdateItem(_data){return RequestTool.PutRequest(RequestTool.API_URL+"/MarketItem/Update",_data);};var GetItemById=function GetItemById(_id){return RequestTool.GetRequest(RequestTool.API_URL+"/MarketItem/Get/"+_id);};export var MarketService={GetAll:GetAll,Add:Add,GetById:GetById,AddMarketItem:AddMarketItem,GetAllItem:GetAllItem,UpdateItem:UpdateItem,GetItemById:GetItemById};
